name: set_interior_walls_to_selected_construction
display_name: Set Interior Walls to Selected Construction
name_xml: Set Interior Walls to Selected Construction
modeler_description_xml: Currently this hard assigns the requested construction to any surfaces that have type of "Wall" and an exterior boundary condition of "Outdoors". In a future version this could apply to default constructions sets first, and then only hard assign to surfaces, that were previously hard assigned.
description_xml: Replace all interior walls with the specified construction.
